name: Kankarwa Haveli

reviews.text: I chose this hotel after a review I have read. And my choice happened to be correct.
reviews.title: Such a beautiful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here Dec 06 and paid Rs850 per night which is their cheapest room i think.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: Great haveli, lots of character. Room was clean and presentable (no TV). Shower was hot and good.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and good service

reviews.text: Restaurant was great. Views on the lake were second to none. Sunset was brilliant.
reviews.title: Good, but not great, place in Udaipur
Friendly Heritage Hotel on the lake

reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel from 22nd July to 25th July. I spoke to Owner earlier and he asked just to send an email for the reservation which we did. Upon arrival, the rooms were ready. We had two rooms and both the rooms had good views of lake as well as lake palace hotel.
reviews.title: Great hotel and service

reviews.text: Make sure you ask for the room immediately above Lake Picola; it has a beautiful alcove with cushions. Open the windows and watch the kids jump into the water, the women wash their clothes.
reviews.title: Enchanting Kankarwa

reviews.text: In the afternoons, the sun reflects off of the water and through the windows; magical sparkles are projected on the walls of the room.
reviews.title: Great accommodation option

reviews.text: The owner, a retired General, is friendly and his wife is in charge of the kitchen (We had the single best meal in India on the rooftop. I must admit, it beat the 5-star Lake Palace Hotel kitchen). Really.
reviews.title: No hot water!

reviews.text: We spent 2 nights at Kankarwa Haveli in Udaipur in Jan 06.
reviews.title: Perfect for our honeymoon
you must stay here
reviews.text: The service in the hotel was very friendly and helpful. Our double room (207) was very spacious and clean with awesome views across the lake. Breakfast on the terrace overlooking the lake was a great way to start your day. The hotel is well located for the palace and the many restaurants only a few minutes stroll away.

description: A heritage hotel in 180 years old haveli renovated in 1993 by Kankarwa family.
